name: A Persistent Illusion
description:
A Persistent Illusion is a VR room-escape/puzzle game intended to be experienced with a Google Cardboard viewer. It isn't necessary, but it is recommended.

How to play:
Click on things to interact with them when your cursor (in the center of the screen) is on them.
The rest is up to you to figure out.

I'll be updating regularly with more levels.
If you have any questions, tweet me @ryanupinhere
